comments.author: dhartley@flyingcolourscorp.com
comments.creator: dhartley@flyingcolourscorp.com
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Firefox/3.6.13 ( .NET CLR 3.5.30729)
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101207 Lightning/1.0b2 Thunderbird/3.1.7

After importing a calendar in either ICS or CSV format the events are visible until I attempt to add an event or update the calendar.  Then It is bold in the Calendar but not details are visible in the events list.


Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Delete Calendar
2. Create NEW Calendar
3. Import Calendar 
4. Events are visable until calendar is used.
5. go to events and Task
6. click calendar
7. go to views and check mini month

Actual Results:  
I can see bold dates in the mini month but there is no details shown in any of the calendar views day, week, mutli, month


Expected Results:  
The expected Results are that the Calendar is visible until the calendar is used.
then the events are missing from all views

Lunar.ics is the calendar I have been attempting to import into the Calendar

comments.author: acdp@outlook.com
comments.text:
I notice that the lunar.ics file has lunar events from 2002 - 2015...

Are you reviewing back in the right years? It is a big file to import, also old data. Maybe that is why no visual, or is that too simplistic?
